title: The Fake-Faced Prince and the Heartbreaker Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Bullying   Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Forced Living Arrangements   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manipulative Characters   Master-Servant Relationship   Modern Day   Sharp-tongued Characters   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters
author: Lin   沫之离
description:
After Ji Xiaotiao, an ordinary girl, was forced to run for a whole block by a handsome stranger, her life ceased to be ordinary.

Her IQ was 179.99, but she was called a moron. She just wanted to live a regular life, but now it was full of drama. It was one thing to be treated like a maid, but to dress like a guy and audition as his assistant at his private high school? Well, she was so tough now she could deal with whatever happened when it happened.

Xu Moqi didn’t care about Ji Xiaotiao’s internal dialogue as he said, “One final thing you have to remember. Even if you forget who you are, don’t forget about this! Sakura and Maple Leaf are not far apart. We’ll meet again, but pretend you don’t know me!”

Xiaotiao rolled her eyes. Didn’t he just say to pretend to be his maid when they met again? Now they had to pretend they didn’t know each other? You think everyone wants to know you? I wish I could ignore you!>
